88.title: Holocaust Avengers : Fact and
88.author: Kathrin Bower.
notes: "German Studies Association annual conference, Oct. 3-6, 2002, San Diego, CA."

"The purpose of this paper is two-fold: to outline the German and Jewish influence on the American comic book industry and its response to WWII and to analyze how the portrayal of the Holocaust in mainstream comics has evolved since the 1940s."
